description: Manage gateway connection on Arc machine.

commands.name: az arcgateway create
commands.syntax:
az arcgateway create --gateway-name
                     --resource-group
                     [--allowed-features]
                     [--gateway-type {Public}]
                     [--location]
                     [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                     [--tags]
examples: az arcgateway create --name MyArcgateway --resource-group myResourceGroup --location eastus2euap --subscription mySubscription

commands.name: az arcgateway delete
commands.syntax:
az arcgateway delete [--gateway-name]
                     [--ids]
                     [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                     [--resource-group]
                     [--subscription]
                     [--yes]
examples: az arcgateway delete --name MyArcgateway --resource-group myResourceGroup --subscription mySubscription

commands.name: az arcgateway list
commands.summary: List all Arc gateway resources associated with a specific subscription.

commands.name: az arcgateway show
commands.summary: Show the details of a specific Arc gateway resource.
examples: az arcgateway show --name myArcgateway --resource-group myResourceGroup --subscription mySubscription

commands.name: az arcgateway wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
